CONFIG.description: The configuration settings for a trivia session.

bot_plays.description: Whether or not the bot gains points during the session.

delay.description: Answer time limit in seconds, must be positive float greater than 0.0.

max_score.description: Number of points required in order win the trivia, must be positive integer.

payout_multiplier.description: The payout multiplier, must be positive float.

reveal_answer.description: Whether or not to reveal the answer when the question times out.

timeout.description: Timeout per question in seconds, must be positive float greater than 0.0.

use_spoilers.description: Whether to use spoiler markdown when revealing question answers.
